mdRecord.dcterms:title: Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia and Charles C. Wall in the Central Passage at Mount Vernon, January 14, 1947
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rowe, Abbie, 1905-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia and Mount Vernon's Resident Superintendent Charles C. Wall in the central passage at Mount Vernon. The photograph is adhered to card stock with a printed caption below: Superintendent C. C. Wall of Mount Vernon escorts His Royal Highness through the central hall of Mount Vernon. On the left may be seen the main staircase of the mansion.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
